name: CustomBeamDimensions
description: Defines custom beam profile dimensions by category for ModelFromSurface component. The Beam category is selected in the Context menu(right click on component).

inputParameters.name: width
inputParameters.description: Width dimension of beams of the selected type.

inputParameters.name: height
inputParameters.description: Height dimension of beams of the selected type. This corresponds to the Frame Depth in the ModelFromSurface component. WARNING: this tends to make the joints fail

outputParameters.name: Dimensions
outputParameters.description: Beam Dimension dict object for SurfaceModelOptions custom_dimensions.
